import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import currencyFormatter from 'currency-formatter'; import { BsDash, BsPlus, BsTrash } from "react-icons/bs"; const Cart = () => { const { products } = useSelector(state => state.CartReducer); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return (

Your Cart

{products.length > 0 ? <>
Picture
Name
Price
Inc/Dec
Total Price
Remove
{products.map(product => (
{product.name}
{currencyFormatter.format(product.discountPrice, { code: 'USD' })}
dispatch({ type: "DEC", payload: product.id })}> {product.quantity} dispatch({ type: "INC", payload: product.id })}>
{currencyFormatter.format(product.discountPrice * product.quantity, { code: 'USD' })}
dispatch({ type: "REMOVE", payload: product.id })}>
))}
Summary
: "You Do Not Have Product"}
) } export default Cart
